text: Patrick Joseph Wilson (born July 3, 1973) is an American actor and singer. He is known for his roles in The Alamo, The Phantom of the Opera, Little Children, Watchmen, The A-Team, The Ledge, Insidious, and as Ed Warren in The Conjuring, The Conjuring 2 and The Conjuring 3. Wilson appeared in a voice cameo appearance as the President of the United States in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016) and appeared as Ocean Master in Aquaman (2018). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Virginia Category:Singers from Virginia Category:People from Norfolk, Virginia
title: Patrick Wilson (American actor)
